import React from 'react' const Header = () => { const burger = document.querySelector('#burger'); const menu = document.querySelector('#menu'); const toggle = () => { burger.addEventListener('click', () => { if (menu.classList.contains('hidden')) { menu.classList.remove('hidden'); } else { menu.classList.add('hidden'); } }) } return (

toggle()}>
